entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cannot create instance of type 'X' because parameter 'XParameter' has no matching config. Each parameter in the constructor that does not have a default value must have a corresponding config entry. #77660
  • Performance: JIT is emitting multiple conversion instructions when using float-math #77658
    Future
  • `Directory.GetFileSystemEntries` returns nonexistent paths when given a volume only #77657
  • Significantly slower console output on Windows compared to macOS #77656
  • The Jit reorders null checks on field addresses with calls that have return buffers #77650
    8.0.0
  • TimeZoneInfoTests.ConvertTimeFromToUtc_UnixOnly test fails around DST change #77648
  • Mono does not null-check addresses for zero-offset `ldflda`s #77647
  • [API Proposal]: Add GetViewBetween method to SortedDictionary #77645
  • `CommandLineToArgvW` has different behavior than `SegmentCommandLine` #77644

Closed

  • [RFC] Refactory proposal #41926
    Future
  • Use -fno-strict-aliasing #6383
    Future
  • Review use of unreached() in the JIT #2120
    Future
  • JIT alloc.h missing functionality to warn against using new and delete. #4630
    Future
  • [SuperPMI] Investigate EH interactions across the JIT/EE interface. #5514
    Future
  • Move the JIT interface to explicitly sized types. #5837
    Future
  • Replace ad-hoc hash table being used for NODEBASH_STATS with a standard one #6665
    Future
  • JIT throughput idea: measuring frequently-inlined function cost #7711
    Future
  • JIT throughput: x86 encoder, for AVX #7713
    Future
  • Emit AVX-512 vector instructions #8264
    Future
  • The port is incorrect. #77653
  • The Uri class has a lot of functionality, which does not need a proxy and which is executed #77654
  • Excess memory allocation. #77652
  • [RyuJIT] Audit places that set lvAddrExposed to true #8888
    Future
  • JIT: automate release/check jit codegen comparison #9129
    Future
  • Simplify the 'emit immediate' logic in emitxarch #9559
    Future
  • [RyuJIT] rename var_types JITtype2varType(CorInfoType type) and improve description #9703
    Future
  • [RyuJIT] Merge code paths for SSE and SSE2 scalar comparison intrinsics code generation. #9706
    Future
  • Optimize placement of VZEROUPPER #10484
    Future
  • Move the HWIntrinsic Load/Store operations to use GenTreeIndir nodes #10488
    Future
  • ConfigurationBinder fails to bind class that implements IDictionary #77246
    8.0.0
  • Suspicious move, possible use after move? #10662
    Future
  • Folding LoadAlignedVector* into the consumer instructions with VEX-encoding #11592
    Future
  • emitinsBinary() in emitxarch.cpp: has some functionality that belongs to codegen #6356
    Future
  • Codegen: Checking for ISA support affects inline codegen #12791
    Future
  • Improve preferencing and code generation for FMA #12984
    Future
  • 'Vector{nnn}.Create' methods have non ideal codegen for `CreateScalar` #13525
    Future
  • [Linux] mixed Interpreter and JIT compiler #13759
    Future
  • JIT sometimes emits unnecessary movsxd instructions when performing logical operations against consts #32089
    Future
  • Vectorize JIT "long" bitset type #32840
    Future
  • [bug]incorrect alignment for elements in array #77539
  • [mono] mono crash on struct copy #77588
  • The sample instruction to build, test, and get code coverage for .NET libraries uses wrong folder #77642

PullRequests

Created

  • Delete a bit of dead code #77655
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use GT_IND instead of LoadVector #77651
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Add package readme for Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Binder #77649
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fix Binding with IDictionary<,> implementer types #77582
    regression-from-last-release, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Fix #77642 to update instruction to build, test, and get code coverage result in code-coverage.md #77643
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Run debugger tests with one work item per test class #77417
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, area-Debugger-mono

Updated

  • Make Type.IsEnum and Type.GetEnumUnderlyingType intrinsics #71685
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Mono musl support #76500
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: introduce some SSA accounting and checking #77055
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fold bound checks for static readonly arrays/strings #77593
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix non-standard modifiers of printf in GC #77627
    area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Use DOTNET_EnableCrashReport to create dumps #77578
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add explicit null checks for zero-offset struct fields #77641
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make ResourceManager.BaseName work as documented. #75497
    area-System.Resources, community-contribution
  • Improve XmlSerializationWriter.WriteTypedPrimitive #76436
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Avoid reporting empty debug info ranges to the vm #77289
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] TAR: Trim file type bits from mode header #77612
    area-System.IO, 7.0.x
  • [mono] Initial support for unloadable ALCs #77399
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Emit less jump-stubs on x64 #77639
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Switch CoreCLR WeakReference to unified managed implementation #77196
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [hot_reload] implement param reflection #77563
    area-EnC-mono

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-30
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • can be Native AOT used as an analogue of obfuscation? #2062

Updated

  • Question: NativeAOT-LLVM: GT_ARR_LENGTH semantics #2061
  • Support x86 for NativeAOT #1471
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM, WASM] Question: Export methods from referenced project #2045

PullRequests

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Turn on optimisation in RyuJit module, partial support for FIELD_LIST and lowering promoted fields #2007

Created

  • PublishAot warning with net8.0 #28823

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-30
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Proposal: obsolete ISourceGenerator, SyntaxReceiver and all non-incremental APIs #65106
  • .editorconfig file_header_template: can't use # (or ;) symbol #44596
    Backlog
  • VS caches Source Generator aggressively - hinders iterative development #48083
    Compiler.Next
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Common package 4.3.1 references invalid 4.3.0 assembly version for netstandard2.0 #64926

PullRequests

Created

  • Provide RIVT for unit test assembly #65111
    Area-Analyzers
  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #65110
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #65109
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #65108
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Extend pattern explainer for more complicated graphs #65002
    Area-Compilers
  • Additional ref fields tests #65107
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields

Issues

  • Fix shadow visibility on Windows #10996
